name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live ＂LOCK ON＂ 有明アリーナ [DpYSUe6Ca9o]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A compilation of fan messages, concert rules, and merchandise information for Amane Kanata's 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" is displayed on screen.
A wide shot of Ariake Arena filled with fans holding blue lightsticks as Amane Kanata makes pre-show announcements over the PA system.

subtitles.original:
ATTENTION ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english: ATTENTION To all visitors: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance. Cheering loudly is okay.

subtitles.original: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live LOCK ON 2次販売グッズ
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live LOCK ON 2nd Round Merchandise Sale

subtitles.original: あ、あ、あ、あ
subtitles.english: A, a, a, a

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか、皆さん？
subtitles.english: Can you hear me, everyone?

subtitles.original: イェーイ！本日は天音かなた 1st Solo Live『LOCK ON』にご来場いただき、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you all for coming to Amane Kanata's 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" today!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！天音かなたです！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm Amane Kanata! Yay!

subtitles.original: 最後までライブを楽しんでいただくために、いくつかご案内させていただきます。
subtitles.english: To ensure everyone enjoys the live show until the end, I have a few announcements to make.

subtitles.original: 公演中の撮影、録音、録画機材の使用は固くお断りいたします。
subtitles.english: Photography, recording, and the use of recording equipment during the performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: そして、みんな！万が一具合が悪くなってしまった場合は、絶対に無理をせず、お近くのスタッフへお知らせください。
subtitles.english: Also, everyone! In the unlikely event that you feel unwell, please don't push yourself and notify a nearby staff member.

subtitles.original: 絶対だよ、おーい！
subtitles.english: Promise me, okay!

subtitles.original: 会場内でのモッシュ、ダイブ、ステージに物を投げ込むなど、
subtitles.english: Moshing, diving, throwing objects onto the stage,

subtitles.original: 他の皆さんの迷惑になったり、公演を妨げる行為は一切禁止です。
subtitles.english: or any other acts that cause trouble for others or obstruct the performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: ルールを守って盛り上がってください！
subtitles.english: Please follow the rules and have a great time!

subtitles.original: えらい！
subtitles.english: Good job!

subtitles.original: 本公演は映像配信、写真撮影用のカメラが会場内に配置され、客席が映り込む場合がございます。
subtitles.english: For this performance, cameras for video streaming and photography are placed within the venue, and the audience seats may be captured on film.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！いいよな！
subtitles.english: Yay! Cool, right!

subtitles.original: 映像や写真はプロモーションなどに使用される可能性がございますので、あらかじめご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Please be aware that video and photos may be used for promotional purposes.

subtitles.original: はーい！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Okay! Thank you!

subtitles.original: またライブのハッシュタグは #打ち抜けかなた なので、
subtitles.english: Also, the hashtag for the live show is #UchinukeKanata,

subtitles.original: みんなハッシュタグを使って配信で見てくれているみんなも、
subtitles.english: so everyone, including those watching the stream, please use the hashtag.

subtitles.original: お前らは…帰り道かな？
subtitles.english: As for you all... maybe on your way home?

subtitles.original: 帰り道にね、またハッシュタグを使ってたくさん盛り上げてください！
subtitles.english: On your way home, please use the hashtag and keep the excitement going!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: それでは開演までもう少し、みんなで一緒に盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, just a little longer until the show starts, let's all get excited together!
